description: Various airspace instruments support the SUA format, including the Glide Navigator II and NK ClearNav. Glider pilots would utilize these devices to plan flights, but with the advancement of GPS technology, these instruments and SUA files are seldomly used.
Some types of airspace information include:
NOTE: The SUA format is developed by Tim Newport-Peace.
